org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl

Class UnboundReactorImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.ReactorImpl
        • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.impl.UnboundReactorImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Runnable, Blade, MessageSource, Closeable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlockingReactorImpl, IsolationReactorImpl, NonBlockingReactorImpl

    public abstract class UnboundReactorImpl
extends ReactorImpl
    Common code for NonBlockingReactor and IsolationReactor, which are not bound to a thread.

    UnboundReactorImpl supports thread migration only between instances of this class.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase

      • flush

              throws java.lang.Exception
        Flushes buffered messages, if any. Returns true if there was any.
        Parameters:
